name: Helix Smash
description:
Helix Smash! is a exciting ball game where players tap to smash the helix stack and help the ball to the bottom.
Hold as long as possible to get perfect.

You will definitely LOVE:
- The ball smashing action is so strong and impressive
- Hundreds of exciting and unique balls
- Numerous beautiful 3D helix stack
- Simple one-finger control 👆
- Best time killer

Which level of stack can you get to ?! Helix Smash! is ready to challenge you!
